snippet: As three credit-card-information thieves are sentenced, a court decision reflects the expanded definition of damages in cases of identity theft.
lead_paragraph: As three credit-card-information thieves are sentenced, a court decision reflects the expanded definition of damages in cases of identity theft.

headline.seo: In Credit-Card-Number Case, Identity-Theft Victims Finally Get Some Respect
headline.main: In Credit-Card-Number Case, Identity-Theft Victims Finally Get Some Respect
